  • Method Details

    • isInTransaction

      boolean isInTransaction()

    • startTransaction

      TraceEntry startTransaction(String transactionType, String transactionName, MessageSupplier messageSupplier, TimerName timerName)
      If there is no active transaction, a new transaction is started. If there is already an active transaction, this method acts the same as ThreadContext.startTraceEntry(MessageSupplier, TimerName) (the transaction name and type are not modified on the existing transaction).

    • startTransaction

      TraceEntry startTransaction(String transactionType, String transactionName, MessageSupplier messageSupplier, TimerName timerName, OptionalThreadContext.AlreadyInTransactionBehavior alreadyInTransactionBehavior)
